description:
• In this course you are going to learn things like:
    • How to Work With Your Client.
    • How to Create a Design Brief.
    • Understanding the Elements And Fundamentals of Logo Design.
    • How to Design the Five Logo Types.

    This Course Includes:
    • Over 25 lectures and 2 hours worth of content
    • Sample templates used to do freelance Graphic Designing
    • Information on what a Design Brief is and how to use it
    • A video showing you how to work with clients for freelance work
    • Step-by-step guide to pre-designing and brainstorming
    • Symbols and Elements, What are they and how do I design them?
    • Color Scheming Basics
    • and much more...
    What Are The Requirements?
    • No design experience is required! If you are new to Photoshop, join my Graphic Design In Photoshop Course to get started!
    • Notebook and Pen
    What Am I Going To Get From This Course?
    • Unlimited lifetime access to this course
    • Discounts/coupons for future courses I release
    • Private Facebook Support Community
    • One-On-One Help All The Time!
    • Free access to Graphic Design In Photoshop Course
    • Free 30 day trial to Photoshop CC
    • Access to my Youtube Channel for more tutorials!
    What Is The Target Audience?
    • Those Ready To Learn Logo Design
    • Anyone Wanting To Get Into Freelance Design Work
title: Logo Design - Guide to Logo Design in Photoshop
